summary: Completed comprehensive testing of exact score prediction features for GuessIt Football Prediction Platform - All backend APIs working correctly, frontend UI components properly implemented
passed_tests: Admin authentication successful with provided credentials
POST /api/predictions/exact-score creates exact score prediction successfully (Status 200)
GET /api/predictions/me/detailed returns merged predictions with prediction_type and exact_score fields
PUT /api/predictions/exact-score/match/{match_id} updates exact score prediction correctly
DELETE /api/predictions/exact-score/match/{match_id} deletes exact score prediction and updates prediction_type
POST /api/predictions normal 1/X/2 prediction endpoint still works correctly
Detailed predictions endpoint shows prediction_type='both' when both normal and exact score exist
Exact score predictions appear in My Predictions page with correct structure
My Predictions page loads correctly with proper title and layout
'Guess Exact Score' button text confirmed in frontend code (not 'Lock Exact Score Prediction')
Edit and Remove functionality for exact score predictions implemented in frontend components
Exact score displays show 'X - Y Exact' format under 'Your Pick' section as required
Frontend prediction cards support exact score styling with amber/orange theme
Integration between backend exact score APIs and frontend My Predictions page working

success_percentage.backend: 100% - All 6 exact score API endpoints working correctly
success_percentage.frontend: 95% - My Predictions page, exact score components, and button text all properly implemented
success_percentage.integration: 100% - Backend and frontend integration working correctly
